text: 4.17 Jer 25.29, Mal 3.5, Luk 10.12-14, 23.31, 2 Te 1.8 Chɨn God binɨb ne ke mɨdobun okok, God chɨnop tɨg asɨk bɨlokɨnɨgab ñɨn ak mɨñɨl owup. Chɨnop ned bɨlokɨl, kɨdek binɨb God takaw teplep ne ak ma dɨl tɨbɨlɨkɨpal okok, kɨlop bɨlokɨnɨgab. Pen kɨlop bɨlokɨnɨgab ñɨn ak, kɨli tɨtay dɨl tek yenɨgabal?
